title: ETRIKE - Ad posted by Martin Nel
text:
This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

Trike is fitted with. 

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 

·        
It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V
Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South
African designed, tested, and manufactured EBIKE

title: 27” WOW EBIKE
text:
This nimble and manoeuvrable little electric bike is
super easy to get on and off as a result of its step-through frame design and
just as easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front
basket and rear carrier also make it a very practical vehicle for moving small
loads from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the
rear.

Bike is fitted with: 

·        
High efficiency 750W brushless geared rear hub
electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 85Nm of ample torque. 

·        
2 X 48V / 13.6 Ah Panasonic Lithium Ion pack
which doesn’t build up memory and up to 100% larger capacity than the norm and
increases range significantly.

25A heavy duty intelligent controller provides

setting.

All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time

10 Speed long range drive train provides a

With a smooth suspension setup and a seamless boost of pedaling support, this E-bike gives you the power and technology to ride the trails you dream about.Designed with trail-friendly geometry, Stance E+ helps beginner or intermediate trail riders experience off-road E-bike riding at its best. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: Avalanche DV8 BMX Used, fair condition
text:
Used Avalanche DV8 BMX in fair condition, recently serviced so new brake cables, pads etc. Also put on new front tyre and handlebar grips.

Avalanche BMX bikes are still designed for racing, although you don’t have to race to enjoy riding BMX. 

They have 20-inch wheels, 2-piece handlebars, small seats, long cranks and strong rear hand brakes. 

The chromoly steel frames are light, sturdy and economical.

title: 2020 Fit Bike Co PRK BMX Bike
text: The 2020 Fit Bike Co PRK BMX Bike is designed to absolutely slay skate park lines. The Fit PRK features a lower standover height, short chain stays, 25mm offset, and a 20.5" toptube for an extremely responsive geometry that is maneuverable, yet stable, while sticking huge transitions and ripping 360's. Tailwhips and bar spins are on the table as many times in a row as wanted with the included gyro setup. Fully sealed bearings and a ton of Fit components round the Fit PRK off creating a bike that will tear skate parks to shreds.

title: E - Trike
text:
ETRIKE
R54,850.00 VAT Inclusive and Delivery in SA. Finance
Available

 

This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

Trike is fitted with. 

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 

·        
It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V
Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South
African designed, tested, and manufactured EBIKE

text:
2022 27” WOW
EBIKE R49,850.00 VAT Inclusive and Delivery in SA. Finance Available

 

This nimble and manoeuvrable little electric bike is
super easy to get on and off as a result of its step-through frame design and
just as easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front
basket and rear carrier also make it a very practical vehicle for moving small
loads from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the
rear.

Bike is fitted with: 

·        
High efficiency 750W brushless geared rear hub
electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 85Nm of ample torque. 

·        
2 X 48V / 13.6 Ah Panasonic Lithium Ion pack
which doesn’t build up memory and up to 100% larger capacity than the norm and
increases range significantly. 

·        
25A heavy duty intelligent controller provides
motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent parameter
setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time

·        
10 Speed long range drive train provides a
suitable gear selection for any possible terrain.

Perfect helmet for high demands in cyclocross and road cycling. This helmet is characterised by MIPS brain protection system, Halo 3D adjustment system and an unparalleled ventilation. The removable visor changes your look when needed for MTB or road biking.

the integrated MIPS protection system absorbs and dispenses rotational forces in case of a diagonal impact Convincing protection from traumatic brain injuries!

Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your performance.Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :1. Type of terrain.2. Torque.3. Speed.4. Range.5. Frame size.6. Weight.7. Riding preferences .Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)Your height ( right frame size )Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel www.chilledsquirrel.comGAUTENG AND CAPE TOWN

title: Contact me for what bicycle fits you best
text:
Don't end up buying a bike and needing to buy again after a few months because you didn't know what to get. 

Are you looking to buy a Mountain bike, yet unsure of what to look for? 

Or have you bought one and doesn't feel comfortable, maybe a bit slack or to twitchy. 

Is your back hurting a lot, hands getting numb and upper legs cramping in early stages of exercise?

Are you comfortable on your bike?

I advise on multiple aspects, resell value, desired brands, style and size. 

Some types and styles are more adequate for certain terrains and environments!

Before you buy something you don't know enough about, send me your desired bike, the daily use or styles you'd like to endeavor and i can confirm that it's a good choice or if a different bicycle would be more suitable. 

And list some reason why it's not suitable and why you shouldn't buy it and rather revert to a different bicycle all together. 

This service is free and we will book a meeting or just talk over the phone. Or at a local area, my or your house and we will discuss in person (with a social distancing aspect) why, why not and what rather with examples. 

Mr Elezar Kruger 
0659880098 
Or email 
Eleckruger@gmail.com 

Kind regards
Elezar

title: Mongoose Bicycle For Sale!
text:
Bicycle and bicycle rack for sale - teenager


Mongoose rockadile 24” boys side blue 2016

DETAILS
The 2016 Mongoose Rockadile 24" Boys is a kid's mountain bike. Kitted out nicely, with sure-stopping alloy V-brakes, a clean-shifting Shimano drivetrain, and light, tough alloy wheels clad in Mongoose's own multi-surface treads, at home anywhere a young ride may venture, from park to path to trail to cul-de-sac. The frame is all-aluminum, paired with a suspension fork for a confident, ground-holding ride. New riders will feel confident with the seat-back stability and low standover height.
A good 24" kid's bike.

title: Mongoose Downhill Boot R
text: Mongoose Downhill Boot R Large  frame Bike in good condition The Mongoose Boot'R 27.5 Dual Suspension Mountain bike is a downhill terrain for a pure riding experience that will give you a thrill. Mongoose built this bike with a Tectonic T2 Aluminium frame which is reliably durable yet lightweight and is equipped with internal cable routing and Free Floating Technology Suspension. The floating Coil Deluxe Rear Shock with 200mm of travel and RockShox Boxxer Fork with 200mm travel form a formidable duo which is extremely capable on intense downhill tracks.When you're rolling with all of that speed the Tektro Slate T4 Hydraulic Disc Brakes will give you the braking power you need to ride with control. The Mongoose Boot'R 27.5 Dual Suspension Mountain bike has the versatility to excel on technical downhill trails and still offer an incredibly capable ride on any trail.
